sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux'; import {useHistory, Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import styles from './ProductMain.module.scss'; import {BsPlus, BsArrowRightShort, BsArrowDown} from 'react-icons/bs'; import {BiMinus, BiCheck, BiCartAlt} from 'react-icons/bi'; import {MdKeyboardArrowRight} from 'react-icons/md'; const ProductMain = () => { const history = useHistory(); const [currentProduct, setCurrentProduct] = useState(history.location.state); const [isDelivery, setIsDelivery] = useState(false); const [isDescription, setIsDescription] = useState(false); const deliverySetter = () => { setIsDelivery(!isDelivery); setIsDescription(false); }; const descriptionSetter = () => { setIsDescription(!isDescription); setIsDelivery(false); }; return (

Home Shop {currentProduct.subCategoryId.name} {currentProduct.name}

{!isDelivery && deliverySetter()}>Delivery } {isDelivery && <> deliverySetter()}>Delivery
Our products are delivered all over Poland and each of EU Countries. If you need detail information which you can not find here, then please email info@ardurob.ar and we will provide you required information as soon as we can.
} {!isDescription && descriptionSetter()}>Description } {isDescription && <> descriptionSetter()}>Description
{currentProduct.overview}
}

{currentProduct.name}

Read 1000 Reviews
€{currentProduct.price}

In stock ({currentProduct.quantity})

); }; export default ProductMain;
